issues.description:
Multiple sends exist in one transaction, try to isolate each external call into its own transaction. As external calls can fail accidentally or deliberately.

Call at address: 2687

issues.description:
In the function `_function_0xaafafbf3` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to msg.sender.
It seems that this function can be called without restrictions.
issues.title: Ether send

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function flushStock(address[],address). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
